thread.title: Loree Montoya-Delacuadra

author: Loree Montoya-Delacuadra
title: Loree Montoya-Delacuadra
text:
Very transparent, very prompt, well packaged.
One of my first purchases of an older or antique book online. The book was exactly as described, communications regarding order status excellent, and the packaging was also very good. A bit pricey, but I've been very spoiled in my personal "finds", hence the reason for 4 out of 5 stars. I must say that I would much rather choose an antique book in person, but considering my current limitations, I would order from this entity again. I like the fact they have connected sellers from around the nation or globe. I love the fact they generously build libraries where needed. I feel Biblio is a great resource.
